title: Goblin Tutor
text: Roll a six-sided die for Goblin Tutor. On a 1, Goblin Tutor has no effect. Otherwise, search your library for the indicated card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library afterwards.2 Any Goblin Tutor3 Any enchantment4 Any artifact5 Any creature6 Any sorcery, instant, or interrupt
